text: 『I had an incident just like Hiori!』
『Hm? Which story?』

『The supermarket one! Maybe he noticed something?
    Like, I felt a little bit fluffy all over after!』

『Maybe the other person looked like they wanted
    to talk to you.』

『The opposite! I wanted to talk to him, but I
     couldn't because I was thinking too much.』

『Now I can totally understand the feelings of
    the people at the supermarket!』
『It still takes courage to talk, doesn't it?』
『I see.』

『He works at the convenience store I frequent,
    and he's always the cashier.』

『I already feel like a friend!
    I'd like to have a little chat with him.』

『Like, what kind of a person is he?
     I'd like to more about that person, wouldn't you?』

『That's totally like you Meguru.
     We've became friends in the first place because of it.』

『That time, you're dealing with someone at work,
     so it probably won't be the same.』

『I see.
　It's not like it was with us.』
『That's a tough one.』
『Heyー』

『Normally, I would be able to go about my
    day without thinking too much!』

『The sense of distance, each other's positions.
    Once you start to realize it, it suddenly becomes difficult! !』
『Yep.』

『I'm sure if it were me,
    I wouldn't be able to speak to them either.』
